name: Mautilus
tagline: We craft spectacular applications for every screen
description:
Mautilus is a team of professionals with more than 10 years of experience in OTT multiscreen application development.
The company provides custom applications primarily for international VoD services and TV companies within all major platforms:
- smartphones – iOS & Android
- smart/connected TVs
- HbbTV
- game consoles – PlayStation 3&4, Xbox
- set-top/streaming boxes – Apple TV, Roku, Fire TV (Stick), Chromecast
Mautilus is also focused on developing applications for SmartHome, IoT and VR & AR.
Mautilus has developed a unique SmartTV SDK which allows building an app just once and deploy it on all major connected TV platforms and game consoles (proven on more than 100 apps).
The company has also prepared several OTT and HbbTV white-label solutions that can be customized according to customers’ requirements.
